tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: Ah, there you are. Citizen. Like a moth to a lantern...

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text: Hey... are you sure this is the way to the waterfall? It looks like it's back that way to me.

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: This is the road to something much better, Shifter.

tree.speaker: Rez
tree.text:
............                        
...I think you're mistaken.
(Just play it cool...)

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: Why have there been no other suspects along this entire route? Why is it that, whenever one form of yours enters a cave, the other one emerges?

tree.speaker: Derenisa
tree.text: I don't need evidence anymore, Shifter. I need action.
